item.description:
Wouldn't it be wonderful to have extra cash around?

What would you do with this extra cash? Plan a vacation, take a class, contribute more to your family, pay off debt, save for retirement?

Most people have lists & lists of what they would do with any additional cash that comes their way. Do you? If not, why not?

During this workshop, Kate Beeders, EFT expert, will share what a Quick Cash Infusion is & how to attract extra money into your life through your fingertips.

* Set your goal for a Quick Cash Infusion
* Learn an easy-to-use technique to start clearing out your money blocks
* Get action steps to put you in control of your Quick Cash Infusions

Here’s evidence of one of Kate’s students, attracting quick cash, You can too!

"Guess what my money goal was a small of $1450.00 by Thursday, June 14th.
I got it, ha! +60.00 and 850.00 + 600.00 tomorrow = 2960.00" ~ U. Washington

 

If you're new to EFT:

What's this TAPPING gotta do with LoA? That's how we felt when we first heard about this tapping - EFT - thing.

When combined with LoA principals, Emotional Freedom Technique (EFT) has been advocated by LoA experts like Jack Canfield, Joe Vitale and Bob Proctor (who were featured on The Secret) and Michael Losier as a powerful way to tap yourself out of “blocks” that stop you from attracting more of what you want.

***************************************************

About Kate Beeders:

Kate Beeders is a success coach, specializing in helping heart-centered entrepreneurs make more money FAST!!! She has developed a powerful technique which combines her business development expertise, Tapping, & the Law of Attraction that helps her clients get their expertise out into the world in a bigger way…they attract more clients, more opportunities, more money, & develop more self-confidence. Many even double their income in a few short months!

As a highly sought after Thought Leader, Kate frequently speaks at large events. She was a featured presenter for the 2011 & 2012  Tapping World Summit, with over 825,000 listeners worldwide and is a certified EFT/MTT & Matrix Reimprinting Practitioner.

Her radio show "Tapping to Success" features internationally known experts, such as, Jack Canfield, Marci Shimoff, and Elizabeth Lesser. Kate was recently acknowledged by a New York Times & Hay House best-selling author in her latest book about the Law of Attraction.

To get your f*ree Success Tips Report, please visit :  http://www.successcoachingwithKate.com

***************************************************
RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming.

We provide appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this & we very much appreciate your support!

***************************************************

For parking & directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft :

(1) Go here: http://www.meetup.com/lawofattraction-us/files/

(2) Log in

(3) Scroll down and click "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

item.name: How to Attract a Quick Cash Infusion
